refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions for decoding and encoding ASN1 representations of elliptic curve entities

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int ECPKParameters_print(BIO *bp, const EC_GROUP *x, int off); int ECPKParameters_print_fp(FILE *fp, const EC_GROUP *x, int off);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The ECPKParameters represent the public parameters for an EC_GROUP structure, which represents a curve.
The ECPKParameters_print() and ECPKParameters_print_fp() functions print a human-readable output of the public parameters of the EC_GROUP to bp or fp. The output lines are indented by off spaces.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: ECPKParameters_print() and ECPKParameters_print_fp() return 1 for success and 0 if an error occurs.

refsection.title: SEE ALSO
refsection.para: crypto 3 , ec 3 , EC_GROUP_new 3 , EC_GROUP_copy 3 , EC_POINT_new 3 , EC_POINT_add 3 , EC_KEY_new 3 , EC_GFp_simple_method 3 ,
